Class LMAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks.LMAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LandmarkAction

    public class LMAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements LandmarkAction
    LMAction class implements actions in the landmarks graph.

    1.0
